it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.authenticationManager

Class AuthenticationEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.authenticationManager.AuthenticationEndpoint

  • @Path(value="/")
public class AuthenticationEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    This RESTful class manage the authentication process

    • Method Detail

      • register

        @Path(value="/register")
 @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response register(RegistrationForm registrationForm)
        Allows the user to register himself into the system
        Parameters:
        registrationForm - message containing all required info to register an user
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled ( and a token in the body ) or an HTTP 401 Unauthorized response status code if the user is already registered or an HTTP 408 Request Timeout response status code if the key requested before is expired or otherwise an HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code ( that means there are invalid fields, the wrong ones are specified in the message body, if the body is empty the decryption of the password has failed )

      • submitLogin

        @Path(value="/login")
 @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response submitLogin(Credentials credentials)
        Allows the user to log himself into the system
        Parameters:
        credentials - message containing all required info to recognize an user
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled ( in the body name and surname of the user and a token) or an an HTTP 401 Unauthorized response status code if the user is not registered or an HTTP 403 Forbidden response status code if the credential are incorrect, or an HTTP 408 Request Timeout response status code if the key requested before is expired or an HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code ( that means there are invalid fields, the wrong ones are specified in the message body, if the body is empty the decryption of the password has failed)

      • editProfile

        @Path(value="/manage-user")
 @PATCH
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response editProfile(RegistrationForm updatedUserInfo)
        Allows the user to modify his account info
        Parameters:
        updatedUserInfo - message containing the user credentials and the modified infos
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled (and in the body a token) or an an HTTP 401 Unauthorized response status code if the credential are incorrect or an HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if hte specified user is not registered, or an HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code with a body not empty ( that means there are invalid fields, the wrong ones are specified in the message body , if the body is empty the decryption of the password has failed)

      • deleteProfile

        @Path(value="/manage-user/{ email }/{ pws }")
 @DELETE
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteProfile(@PathParam(value="email")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="pws")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String password)
        Allows the user to delete his account
        Parameters:
        email - email address of the user
        password - user's password
        Returns:
        an HTTP 200 OK success status response code if the request is fulfilled or an an HTTP 401 Unauthorized response status code if the credential are incorrect or an HTTP 400 Bad Request response status code if hte specified user is not registered,

      • authenticate

        private User authenticate(java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                          UserNotRegisteredException
        Find out if exist a user with the specified credentials
        Parameters:
        email - username of the user
        password - password of the user
        Returns:
        the authenticated user class
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - if not exist an user with the specified credentials
        UserNotRegisteredException - if the user credential specified are not registered in the system

      • issueToken

        private java.lang.String issueToken(User user,
                                    java.lang.String idDevice)
        Issue a token ( random String ), if a token already exists it replaces it
        Parameters:
        user - user who identify himself with the token
        idDevice - device identifier at which the token is associated with
        Returns:
        the issued token

      • buildResponseToken

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response buildResponseToken(java.lang.String token)
        Build a token response
        Parameters:
        token - to be inserted in the response body
        Returns:
        the response requested

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response buildLoginTokenResponse(java.lang.String token,
                                                          User user)
        Build a token response to an user login
        Parameters:
        token - token to be inserted in the response body
        user - who is logging in
        Returns:
        the response requested

      • authenticate

        private void authenticate(User userToBeAuthenticated,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws InvalidCredentialsException
        Checks if the inserted credentials are correct
        Parameters:
        userToBeAuthenticated - user whose credentials are to be checked
        password - to be validated
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - if the password is wrong

                            throws InvalidFieldException
        Checks that the registration form fields are consistent
        Parameters:
        registrationForm - form to be checked
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if some fields are invalid ( which one is written into the error message )

      • loadUser

        protected static User loadUser(java.lang.String email)
                        throws UserNotRegisteredException
        Load the user's class instance of an user
        Parameters:
        email - identifier of the user
        Returns:
        the loaded user
        Throws:
        UserNotRegisteredException - if the user in not present in database, so he's not registered
